segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children near the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is seriously balancing on a two-step stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's stretching that far; it's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, waiting eagerly for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, completely invested in the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on those sweets, oblivious to the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The 'COOKIE JAR' label is prominently displayed, a clear target.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just turn around and see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are going to cause quite a commotion if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever plan, though, sneaking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR
